title: 'Boys and Girl - Yahoo NFL's Charles Robinson and former Dallas scout Bryan Broaddus on Garrett, Replacements, Dak’s Price, Off-Season Contract Reckoning
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Yahoo NFL's Charles Robinson and former Dallas scout Bryan Broaddus on Garrett, Replacements, Dak’s Price, Off-Season Contract Reckoning
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby are joined by former Cowboys scout Bryan Broaddus, and Yahoo Senior NFL Reporter Charles Robinson, for a deep-dive on the contract statuses of Jason Garrett and Dak Prescott. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
